media:group.media:title: Can Lake Sevan be saved?
media:group.media:description:
This week on Insights, Eric Hacopian is coming to you from the shores of Lake Sevan. First, he examines recent comments made by the US Secretary of State regarding the so-called peace process between Armenia and Azerbaijan. Then, Eric delves into environmental issues in Armenia, with a specific emphasis on water policy in a country facing geographic challenges.

ีึีกีถีฝีซีกีตีซ ิฑีฆีฃีกีตีซ ีชีธีฒีธีพีซ ีจีถีฟึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีซ ีฅึีฏึีธึีค ึีธึีฌีธึีด ีฑีกีญีกีฏีธีฒีดีตีกีถ ีธึีชีฅึีซ ีฐีกีฒีฉีกีถีกีฏีจ ีพีฏีกีตีธึีด ีง, ีธึ ีชีธีฒีธีพีธึึีคีจ ีพีกีญีฅีถีธึีด ีง ีฎีกีตึีกีฐีฅีฒ ีกีปีฅึีซ ีฃีกีฒีกึีกึีกีญีธีฝีธึีฉีตีธึีถีซึโค ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีซ ีีฟีฅีฌีฌีก ีีฅีฐึีกีขีฅีฏีตีกีถีซ ีฐีฅีฟ ีฆึีธึีตึีธึีด ีกีฝีธึีด ีง ึีกีฒีกึีกีฃีฅีฟ, ีีกึีซีฆีซ Science Po ีฐีกีดีกีฌีฝีกึีกีถีซ ีคีกีฝีกีญีธีฝ ิฟีกีตีฎ ีีซีถีกีฝีฅีกีถีจึ ีีฅึีปีซีถีซีฝ ีฏีกึีฎีซึีธีพี ีึีกีถีฝีซีกีตีซ ีถีกีญีกีฃีกีฐ ิทีดีกีถีธึีฅีฌ ีีกีฏึีธีถีจ ีคีชีพีกึีซีถ ีฏีกึีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีดีฅีป ีง ีฐีกีตีฟีถีพีฅีฌ ึ ีฝีฟีซีบีพีกีฎ ีง ีฌีซีถีฅีฌีธึ ีฃีถีกีฌ ีขีกีถีกีฏึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีซ ีจีถีฟึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีธึีด ีขีกึีฑึ ีกึีคีตีธึีถึ ีฃึีกีถึีกีฎ ีธึีชีฅึีซ ีฐีฅีฟึ ีีก ีฐีกีพีกีฝีฟีซีกึีถีธึีด ีงี ีึีกีถีฝีซีกีตีธึีด ึีกีฒีกึีกีฏีกีถ ีธึีชีฅึีซ ึีธึีธีญีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีฐีกีตีฏีกีฏีกีถ ีฐีกึึีซ ีพึีก ีนีซ ีกีฆีคีซึ

media:group.media:title: Armeniaโs economy at a crossroads
media:group.media:description:
Lรฉa Hakim, senior country economist for Armenia at the World Bank, sits down with CivilNetโs Mark Dovich to present her teamโs new assessment of Armeniaโs economy. They discuss why Armenia lags behind its peers in job creation, job quality, and job distribution. They also talk about how the country can address the mounting impacts of climate change, and what role diaspora communities can play in Armeniaโs development.
The World Bankโs Second Systematic Country Diagnostic for Armenia, โBeyond Boundaries: Unlocking Potential for a Sustainable Tomorrowโ โ https://shorturl.at/SoAV5
